t: Levolor - Wikipedia
s: March 18, 2025 - The company was purchased by Hunter Douglas in 2016. The company was founded in 1914 in Hoboken, New Jersey by Hans K. Lorentzen, a Danish immigrant who originally started out as a tool and die maker. Lorentzen introduced standardization, vertical integration, metal manufacturing and assembly lines to the window blinds industry. In 1993, Levolor was acquired by Newell (known today as Newell Brands...
